projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: This is my Portfolio site to showcase some of the projects I have worked on my free time.

projects.name: Kanban Board
projects.description: A web app similar to a kanban board where users can add, drag and drop and eliminate tasks as they get them completed.

projects.name: AI Summarizer
projects.description: An AI summarizer app where users can enter a link with an article and a summary of it will be displayed to the screen.

projects.name: Movie Finder
projects.description: The Movie Finder project is a web application that allows users to search for movies.

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: Fun and interactive game where the user needs to remember their position to match the pair and get the points.
